propertydef.name: Update ID
propertydef.description: The unique identifier for the new update. No spaces are allowed.

propertydef.name: Version
propertydef.description: The version number of MineStar to which the update applies.

propertydef.name: Short Description
propertydef.description: A one line description of the update.

propertydef.name: Detailed Description
propertydef.description: A more detailed explanation of the update.

propertydef.name: Scope of Change
propertydef.description: What is affected by the update?

propertydef.name: Risks and Contingencies
propertydef.description: What are the risks? What do you do to avoid them?

propertydef.name: Installation Process
propertydef.description: How do you install this update?

propertydef.name: Restarts
propertydef.description: What do you need to restart for this update to take effect?

propertydef.name: Post-install Message
propertydef.description: This will be shown to the user after they install the update.

propertydef.name: Rollback Process
propertydef.description: How do you uninstall this update?

propertydef.name: Post-uninstall Message
propertydef.description: This will be shown to the user after they uninstall the update.

propertydef.name: Testing and Validation
propertydef.description: How do you tell that this update worked?

propertydef.name: Obsoletes
propertydef.description: Other updates made obsolete by this one.

propertydef.name: Related Bugs and Enhancements
propertydef.description: What other problems and updates are related?
